code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteOrder from'./DeleteOrder';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderListItem(_ref){let{order}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex justify-between items-center p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"font-semibold",children:["Order #",order._id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 mt-1",children:["Status: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-blue-600",children:order.status})," \xB7 Total: $",order.total]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit-order/".concat(order._id),className:"btn btn-secondary btn-sm",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteOrder,{orderId:order._id,onDeleted:()=>window.location.reload()})]})]});}export default OrderListItem;
